hiveArticle.title: Phishing Link Checker Chrome Extension - Update V1.1 and V1.2
hiveArticle.body:
### New Features ##### In V1.1 1 - Running the Script every 10 seconds so that if you go from any page in Steemit all the information should be up to date. Commit : [5c5e5f8106c2cf5d7b8dfa856749de1c81ca465e](https://github.com/codingdefined/CheckSteemitLink/commit/ae380f9176699e72f9bddc7f3533a3caea6e7f2e) 2 - Whenever you click on any link it will alert you saying that the site you are going to is not a Steemit site and so do not use your password there. Commit : [5c5e5f8106c2cf5d7b8dfa856749de1c81ca465e](https://github.com/codingdefined/CheckSteemitLink/commit/5c5e5f8106c2cf5d7b8dfa856749de1c81ca465e) ![image.png](https://res.cloudinary.com/hpiynhbhq/image/upload/v1521272550/edhzz0ufxtvmajzzeukt.png) ##### In V1.2 1 - Added Popup which will give details about the Extension and the Current Site you are in. Commits : [1](https://github.com/codingdefined/CheckSteemitLink/commit/43dd60284d8e0f27a63644e44e6233a75a1f6f41),[2](https://github.com/codingdefined/CheckSteemitLink/commit/41dc3bb15fd3d2da16ee15f495724eb28283dd92) and [3](https://github.com/codingdefined/CheckSteemitLink/commit/263c0728fe151bded2f543b3ef14168c767c468e) ![image.png](https://res.cloudinary.com/hpiynhbhq/image/upload/v1521272736/zc6ai0kh1rffrcyzvmt4.png) 2 - Update Maifest.json to include all the details. Commit : [de0bc88cae54e0f7cc2b9f2ad9c5aed826c3bbbc](https://github.com/codingdefined/CheckSteemitLink/commit/de0bc88cae54e0f7cc2b9f2ad9c5aed826c3bbbc) #### Technology Stack JavaScript #### Roadmap - Add more Phishing Websites Known - More Logic to Find out about Phishing Websites #### How to contribute? Create a PR for this Repo :https://github.com/codingdefined/CheckSteemitLink. Also you can add suggestion or errors as an Issue in GitHub. #### Download Chrome Webstore : https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/checksteemitlink/jfbjdjokbmnclfboljafdmcfafamkacd
Posted on Utopian.io - Rewarding Open Source Contributors
